Package com.cafean.client.ui.util

Class DrawingLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.util.DrawingLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    public class DrawingLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.undo.StateEditable
    An object representing an interleaved "layer" of drawing objects inside a BeanBox. DrawingLayer have an ident and an "old ident." These are used identically to the ident and DB_ID fields of AbstractComponents with the exception that the ident pool is allocated by each BeanBox.
    See Also:
    BeanBox.reconnectLayerIDs(), BeanBox.findLayerByIdent(int), BeanBox.findLayerByOldIdent(int)
